issue.title: (#1390) Fixed Release.Smart.prerelease()

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
This PR:
* Solves #1390 
* Fixes `Release.Smart#prerelease()`

Note: 
The string substitution introduced here for `prerelease()` is done because the `JsonString` implementation we use (`org.glassfish.json.JsonStringImpl`) is prepending and appending the `"` character to its value. So for a string "true" it would print `"true"` instead of just `true`.

body: The puzzle `1363-762aa75e` has disappeared from the source code, that's why I closed this issue.

Order was finished: +30 point(s) just awarded to @llorllale[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/llorllale)
